creator: spambait@asu.edu
text:
In autochange.c in the JServ connector, there are a bunch of c++ comments.  This 
prevents it from compiling with regular C compilers.  Particulary, in my case, 
MIPSPro on IRIX.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: This will be resolved in a future version, probably in jakarta-tomcat-connector.

creator: danmil@shore.net
text: This has been fixed in both 3.2.2 and in 3 (jakarta-tomcat)
